title: How old was Dr. Dre when he died? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eminem’s “Marshall Mathers LP” was released on May 23, 2000. In the song “The Real Slim Shady”, Eminem announces that “Dr. Dre’s dead/he’s locked in my basement.” Therefore, it can be presumed that the fictional Dr. Dre died prior to May 23, 2000. However, the ACTUAL Dr. Dre, Andre Romelle Young, is alive and well.
